definition: that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: Don’t worry about mother, I’ll cover for you this time.
sentences.chinese: 别担心妈妈那边，这一次我会为你掩护的。

sentences.english: We pitched on the other side of the hill.
We go there not only in winter, but also in summer.
sentences.chinese: 我们不只冬天去那边，并且炎天也去。

sentences.english: I enjoyed the breath-taking scene of the moon rising over the sea.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢月亮从海那边破水而出的景色。

sentences.english: C. Sorry , I don"t know Pleaseask the policeman over there."
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我不知道，请问那边的警察。

sentences.english: Gold disappeared betweenher legs and the nurses gathered around her head.
sentences.chinese: 金医生坐在她的两腿那边，护士们则站在她的头这边。

sentences.english: And I remember standing there that day thinking about the disturbers of mine.
sentences.chinese: 我还记得那天站在那边思虑着“粉碎我的协调的人”。

sentences.english: I like big manor, likes to easy life, where the fresh air is relaxing.
sentences.chinese: 我喜好大庄园，那边的氛围新颖让人抓紧。

sentences.english: “The Land Down Under” is Australia’s unofficial nickname.
sentences.chinese: “脚下那边的土地”是人们对澳大利亚的别称。

sentences.english: I love fish and you just said there was a lake.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢钓鱼，你刚刚也说那边有个湖了。

sentences.english: Ziggy over there never even met his kid.
sentences.chinese: 那边的兹基甚至从没见过他的孩子。

sentences.english: Just go through the ticket checker over there.
Over there, a man performed the slow-motion dance of tai chi.
sentences.chinese: 那边，一个男人在练习动作舒缓的太极。

sentences.english: A portiere at the farther side showed the entrance to the bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 远处那边的一个门帷露出了通往卧室的进口。

sentences.english: The grass is withered under the tree there.
sentences.chinese: 那边的树下有一片败草。

sentences.english: It was always nice to walk through there.
sentences.chinese: 经常路过那边其实感觉也挺不错的。

definition: there/that place/also written 那裡|那里
outside/outer surface/abroad/place other than one's home
to come over/to manage/to handle/to be able to take care of
to hear (sth said)/one hears (that)/hearsay/listening and speaking
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
interjection indicating approval, appreciation or agreement
outside (also pr. [wai4 mian5] for this sense)/surface/exterior/external appearance
to turn round/to turn one's head/later/by and by
contrary to what one might expect/actually/contrariwise/why don't you
